statements: DELETE FROM solo_travel_trends WHERE travel_id = 100 AND traveler_name = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM solo_travel_trends WHERE travel_date < '2021-01-01' AND destination LIKE 'Europe%';
DELETE FROM solo_travelers WHERE traveler_id = 101 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM travel_logs WHERE destination = 'Paris' AND duration_days > 7;
DELETE FROM travel_activities WHERE activity_id IN (1, 2, 3);
DELETE FROM TravelHistory WHERE total_duration > 7 AND travel_date < '2022-01-01';
